accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: Select the account you want to use.

logout.title: Logout
logout.description: Click an account to end the session

success.title: Successfully logged out
success.description: You have been successfully logged out.

error.password_error: Password is incorrect. Please try again.
error.password_error_with_attempts: Password is incorrect. Please try again. You have used {failedAttempts} of {maxPasswordAttempts} attempts.

error.incorrect: Password is incorrect. Please try again.

set.title: Choose a password
set.description: Your email address has been confirmed. Now set a password to create your account.
set.codeSent: We have sent an email to your address. Follow the instructions to regain access to your account.

required.newPassword: You have to provide a password!

change.title: Change password
change.description: Set the password for your account

required.newPassword: You have to provide a new password!

idp.title: Login with SSO
idp.description: Select one of the following providers to log in

linkingSuccess.title: Account linked
linkingSuccess.description: You have successfully linked your account!

loginError.title: Login failed
loginError.description: An error occurred while logging in.

linkingError.title: Account linking failed
linkingError.description: An error occurred while linking your account.

completeRegister.title: Let's get acquainted
completeRegister.description: Check your details and preferences to complete your account.

idp.chooseAlternativeMethod: Choose an alternative method to log in

verify.title: Verify your identity
verify.description: Choose one of the following factors.
verify.noResults: No second factors available to set up.

set.title: Set up 2-Factor
set.description: Choose one of the following second factors.

verify.title: Verify 2-Factor
verify.totpDescription: Enter the code from your authenticator app.
verify.smsDescription: Enter the code you received via SMS.
verify.emailDescription: Enter the code you received via email.

error.unable_to_verify: This code is invalid. Please try again.

set.title: Set up 2-Factor
set.totpDescription: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app.
set.smsDescription: Enter your phone number to receive a code via SMS.
set.emailDescription: Enter your email address to receive a code via email.
set.totpRegisterDescription: Scan the QR Code or navigate to the URL manually.

verify.title: Authenticate with a passkey
verify.description: Your device will ask for your fingerprint, face, or screen lock

set.title: Set up passkey
set.description: Your device will ask for your fingerprint, face, or screen lock

info.description: A passkey is an authentication method on a device such as your fingerprint, Apple FaceID, or something similar.

verify.title: Verify 2-Factor
verify.description: Verify your account with your device.

set.title: Set up 2-Factor
set.description: Set up a device as a second factor.

disabled.title: Registration disabled
disabled.description: Registration is disabled. Contact your administrator.

missingdata.title: Missing data
missingdata.description: Provide email, first and last name to register.

register.title: Create account
register.noMethodAvailableWarning: No authentication method available. Contact your administrator.
register.selectMethod: Select the method you want to authenticate with
register.agreeTo: By continuing, you agree to our
register.login: Already have a Thanqs account? Log in

error.user_already_exists: A user with this email already exists. Please log in.

password.title: Choose a password
password.description: Set a password now to create your account.

required.password: You have to provide a password!

invite.title: Invite user
invite.description: Enter the email address and name of the user you want to invite.
invite.info: The user will receive an email with further instructions.
invite.notAllowed: Your settings do not allow inviting users.

success.title: User invited
success.verified: The user has been invited and has already verified their email.
success.notVerifiedYet: The user has been invited. They will receive an email with further instructions.

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while logging in.

verify.successDescription: The user has been successfully verified.

verify.title: Verify user
verify.description: Enter the code from the verification email.
verify.codeSent: We have sent an email to {email}. Click the link in the email to confirm your email address and create your account.
verify.codeSentAgain: We have sent a new email to {email}. Click the link in the email to confirm your email address and create your account.

authenticator.title: Choose authentication method
authenticator.description: Select the method you want to authenticate with
authenticator.allSetup: You have already set up an authenticator!
authenticator.linkWithIDP: or link with an Identity Provider

usercode.title: Device code
usercode.description: Enter the code displayed on your app or device.

request.title: {appName} wants to connect
request.disclaimer: By clicking Allow, you give {appName} and Zitadel permission to use your information according to their respective terms and privacy policies. You can revoke this access at any time.

scope.offline_access: Allow offline access to your account.

error.unknownContext: Could not retrieve the user's context. Make sure you enter the username first or provide a loginName as a search parameter.
error.sessionExpired: Your current session has expired. Please log in again.
error.failedLoading: Failed to load data. Please try again.
